channel.title: Data governance on Service Catalog Tools Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Data governance on Service Catalog Tools Workshop

item.title: Create the control
Provision the control
Create the product
item.description: What are we going to do? We have provisioned a detective control to look for AWS RDS Instances that have don’t have encryption enabled. We can do better, and create an AWS Service Catalog product that meets the encryption requirement by default using service catalog tools. When users create a new RDS instance using this product, encryption at rest is enabled by default and no further configuration is required.
